subject: Horse Racing
Boxing
Advertising and Marketing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: A promotional link is found between Starlight Racing and the promoters of the match between Floyd Mayweather Jr. and Manny Pacquiao, which is set for the same day as the Kentucky Derby.
snippet: A promotional link is found between Starlight Racing and the promoters of the match between Floyd Mayweather Jr. and Manny Pacquiao, which is set for the same day as the Kentucky Derby.
